entries.meaning: (informal, usually preceded by the) A display of ostentatious elegance.

verbs.description: ritz (third-person singular simple present ritzes, present participle ritzing, simple past and past participle ritzed)

entries.meaning: (informal) To behave in an ostentatiously elegant manner.
examples: What would I do with them in the room except dream all night through of ritzing around the world with swells?
